content: i have designed those gloves to go with my witches costume for halloween well if one is going dressed as a witch one must at least be a glamorous one pattern is available on my blog link below enjoy x finished size length 17cm 6 6in circumference unstretched 19cm 7 4in **to make the gloves smaller the easiest was to do this is by using a smaller hook** **pattern is written using uk terms** https //moochka wordpress com/2013/10/20/morticia-gloves/
